tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: (1/3) The control of malaria by the U.S. & Panamanian governments was vital for the construction of the Panama Canal. In 1904, Chief Medical Officer Gorgas established a sanitation plan for the Canal Zone to control mosquitos. #WorldMalariaDay #FSIatHome 📷: @librarycongress
